name: PeopleSoft: Do NOT delete PeopleSoft defined fields from a record.
description: Identify each record field in the Vanilla not in the project environment
output: Failed checks gives the number of records that contain deleted record field. The record field name (detected in the vanilla) can be found in the value column
rationale:
Standard objects are often referenced in many parts of the system. Deleting one of them can impact every part of the system that access to it.
Unnecessarily field in the record should not be deleted
remediation: Restore the record field from the Vanilla
